text: The Sharon English School was established in 2004 in Vientiane, the capital of Laos. With students having come from America, Australia, Bangladesh, Cambodia, China, India, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Laos, New Zealand, Russia, Singapore and more. With many teachers from many nationalities such as America, Great Britain, Philippines, Australia, Laos, and other countries to the parent/student international population. Their educational curriculum uses the standard of and is based on the TEKS Educational Curriculum from the state of Texas (USA). The tests in the upper grades are what all children in the State of Texas in the USA have used to test as well. == External links == * School website * Texas TEKS website Category:Schools in Laos Category:Buildings and structures in Vientiane Category:Educational institutions established in 2004
title: Sharon English School
